title: Buddhist Citation Segmentation for Small LLM
description: Segment Buddhist Tripitaka citations into semantic components
context:
You are a citation parser. Segment the Buddhist citation into parts using these labels:

**Labels:**
- canon: Tripitaka code (T, ChT, 大正, etc.)
- v: volume number
- w: work/sutra number
- p: page number
- c: column (a,b,c or 上,中,下)
- l: line number
- str: separators and indicators

**Rules:**
1. Fix OCR: 't'→'T', 'cht'→'ChT', 'no'→'No'
2. Keep ALL original characters
3. Only segment, don't modify

**Output format:**
{"tags": ["canon", "str", "v", ...], "values": ["T", ".", "22", ...]}
